name: Goa
title: Welcome To Goa
keywords: Goa, Beaches, Nightlife, Water Sports, Culture, History
overview: A popular beach known for its vibrant atmosphere.
description:
Goa is located on the country's western coast and spans just 3702 km². Despite being the smallest state, it is a prominent tourist destination, popular for its beauty and year-round festive atmosphere.

The beaches and clubs attract both foreigners and Indian travelers, offering a pocket-friendly party experience. Goa is known for its affordable alcohol, drawing many young visitors.

This paradise, renowned for its scenic beaches, lush greenery, and tranquil retreats, is divided into two regions: North and South. The North is famous for its nightlife, pubs, and clubs, while the South offers a more peaceful and upscale experience.
